html.DT_OD_MDN_DPP_QUALIFICATIONS_DESCRIPTION: <li class="margin24 noSideMargin"> The device can be turned on and off.</li> <li class="margin24 noSideMargin"> The screen is free of cracks and functionning correctly. </li> <li class="margin24 noSideMargin"> The phone and connecting ports are free of visible corrosion and water damage. </li> <li class="margin24 noSideMargin"> The battery is free of physical damage (examples of physical damage include: Too hot to touch, swelling, or rupture of phone casing). </li> <li class="margin24 noSideMargin"> The phone and charging port are free of cracks, dents and not missing pieces/chunks. </li> <li class="margin24 noSideMargin"> The activation lock is turned off (Example: Find My iPhone). </li>
html.DT_OD_MDN_DPP_APPRAISAL_DESCRIPTION: <p class="margin12 fontSize_3 "> After you complete your order, we'll send you a prepaid shipping box that you can use to mail us your old device after receiving your new device upgrade.</p><p class="margin12 fontSize_3">Please note that if the device does not arrive in the condition described,  a charge will be added to your next bill.</p>
html.DT_OD_PAST_DUE_BALANCE_TITLE: You have a past due balance of $%pastDuePrice% on your account.
